job_description:
Welcome to USG - Pioneering Global IT Solutions and Workforce Management Excellence. USG is a global powerhouse in the Information Technology industry, offering specialized solutions in Data Engineering, Backend Architecture, and Product Development. With a focus on innovation and reliability, USG has established a reputation for excellence and has a global impact while understanding regional needs and client expectations.

Role Description

This is a contract, remote role for a Business Development Manager / Client Partner at United Software Group Inc. The Business Development Manager / Client Partner will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building and maintaining relationships with clients, and developing and implementing strategies to drive sales growth. They will also be responsible for conducting market research, analyzing industry trends, and collaborating with internal teams to develop customized solutions for clients.

Qualifications
• Experience in business development, sales, or related field
• Strong networking and relationship-building skills
• Should generate revenue of minimum 2 to 3 Million.
• Ability to identify and pursue new business opportunities
• Excellent communication and negotiation skills
• Knowledge of the IT industry and emerging technologies
• Experience in market research and analysis
• Ability to work independently and remotely
• Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field
• Relevant certifications (e.g., Sales, Business Development) are a plus
